abstract.t: The Application-Layer Traffic Optimization (ALTO) service aims atproviding applications with information about the network to optimizetheir traffic. Peer-to-peer (P2P) live streaming is one of such applications which can benefit from ALTO. We have recently designed anew scheme to minimize inter-domain traffic in P2P live streamingapplications without impacting video quality. In this draft webriefly describe our solution, and we discuss the implications of thetype of information provided by the ALTO service on overlayconstruction.
